abstract: 8:15 p.m. (5:15 local time) John Markoff, Times reporter, reports seeing about 200 in line at the Palo Alto store and about the same number in Emeryville. He is trying to figure out how many iPhones will be sold opening weekend. Before he finishes, he wanders down to the San Francisco Apple store.
lead_paragraph: 8:15 p.m. (5:15 local time) John Markoff, Times reporter, reports seeing about 200 in line at the Palo Alto store and about the same number in Emeryville. He is trying to figure out how many iPhones will be sold opening weekend. Before he finishes, he wanders down to the San Francisco Apple store.

headline.main: IPhone: It’s Time — West Coast Edition

abstract: Customers eager to buy the cellphone had waited in long lines in front of Apple stores in New York and other cities.
snippet: Customers eager to buy the cellphone had waited in long lines in front of Apple stores in New York and other cities.
lead_paragraph: Apple wanted a spectacle when the iPhone went on sale, and it got just that.

headline.main: Gave Up Sleep and Maybe a First-Born, but at Least I Have an iPhone
headline.print_headline: Gave Up Sleep and Maybe a First-Born, but at Least I Have an iPhone

abstract: A question about battery replacement is usually easy to clear up. But at Apple, there is no such thing as a straightforward answer. There is only spin.
snippet: A question about battery replacement is usually easy to clear up. But at Apple, there is no such thing as a straightforward answer. There is only spin.
lead_paragraph: By Wednesday morning, the iPhone tom-toms were beating in earnest.

headline.main: iPhone Spin Goes Round and Round
headline.print_headline: IPhone Spin Goes Round And Round

abstract: The private equity business hit bumps. A deal was struck for a possible Dow Jones sale, and the Supreme Court struck down a longstanding rule on product pricing.
snippet: The private equity business hit bumps. A deal was struck for a possible Dow Jones sale, and the Supreme Court struck down a longstanding rule on product pricing.
lead_paragraph: THE private equity business hit bumps. A deal was struck for a possible Dow Jones sale, and the Supreme Court struck down a longstanding rule on product pricing.

headline.main: Backers of the Buyout Boom Seem to Be Backing Out
headline.print_headline: Backers of the Buyout Boom Seem to Be Backing Out

abstract: Apple has lots of iPhones in stock, but AT&T takes hours to activate them.
snippet: Apple has lots of iPhones in stock, but AT&T takes hours to activate them.
lead_paragraph: We are in the first day of the AiP (After iPhone) era. It turns out that Apple had so many iPhones in stock  that there was no reason to wait in line. AT&T stores were not so well stocked, at least according to some accounts.

abstract: In contrast to the party atmosphere at Apple stores, a Bay Area AT&T store was funereal last night.
snippet: In contrast to the party atmosphere at Apple stores, a Bay Area AT&T store was funereal last night.
lead_paragraph: After spending six hours in line, then another 90 minutes inside the Apple Store in Corte Madera, north of San Francisco, I decided to check out the action at the AT&T Wireless store in nearby San Rafael.

headline.main: Sad Scenes at an AT&T Wireless Store

abstract: Joe Nocera, the Saturday columnist for the Times, took Apple to task for designing a cell phone with a battery that cannot be replaced by the consumer.
lead_paragraph: Joe Nocera, the Saturday columnist for the Times, took Apple to task for designing a cell phone with a battery that cannot be replaced by the consumer.
